timeline.bodyText: nit: could each sub-group be sorted by client-id?  It makes duplicate checking way easier.  Most IDEs have a sort selected lines option.
timeline.author: shemnon
timeline.diffHunk:

replies.bodyText: Not sure what you mean. I just use Sort Lines from VS code to find and/ or remove any duplicates and manually checked them.
replies.author: stevanlohja
